definition: unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Seeing the man also who had been healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.
sentences.chinese: 又看見那治好了的人，同他們一起站著，都無言可對。

sentences.english: He cornered the witness with clever questions.
sentences.chinese: 他機敏的提問使證人無言可對。
